name: Orphaned Core
desc: Gain a friendly Solus unit that launches itself at enemies for 400% (+400% per stack) . The unit inherits your movement speed items and deals more damage the faster it moves . The unit can be pet to cleanse negative effects . Recharges after 15 seconds.
notes:
The Orphaned Core is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Alloyed Collective expansion.
Grants the user a friendly Solus Invalidator, named Best Buddy.
Instead of shooting Inventory-Disabling projectiles, it launches itself at enemies for 400% (+400% per stack) damage. This attack deals more damage the faster it moves. 
Best Buddy will sprint during this attack, activating various items in the process.
You can interact with the unit to pet it and cleans both of you of negative effects and  cooldown effects.
Best Buddy inherits the user's movement related items. 
The following items are inherited by Best Buddy.

 Paul's Goat Hoof
 Energy Drink
 Mocha
 Elusive Antlers
 Warbanner
 Old War Stealthkit
 Berzerker's Pauldron
 Hunter's Harpoon
 Rose Buckler
 Collector's Compulsion
 Red Whip
 Faraday Spur
 Hopoo Feather (Will not jump mid-air)
 Wax Quail
 Growth Nectar
 H3AD-5T v2 (Cannot use explosion)
 Irradiant Pearl
 Little Disciple
 Weeping Fungus


== Skills & Behavior ==
Rams itself through lighter foes dealing 400% damage and impacting on heavy foes for an additional 1000% damage.
Both damage values are multiplied by movespeed %.
As it's always sprinting when attacking, it multiplies the values by 1.45x at minimum
As such for easier calculations 580% and 1450% can be used instead.


== Notes ==
Best Buddy respawns 30s after being defeated.
The 69.6 base damage on lighter targets is not enough to one shot most basic monsters.
With 15% movement speed it will be able to at least one shot   Lemurians.
The cleansing effect removes cooldown debuffs, such as those from Elemental Rings. This can be used during combat.
When the   final boss steals the player's items, he will NOT steal the Orphaned Core, meaning the user retains Best Buddy for that phase of the fight.
The Solus is "sprinting" when it has a purple aura around it.
Compatible items will appear on the Solus.


== Tips ==
As petting removes cooldown buffs, petting can allow you to use items such as  Singularity Band more frequently.
As petting is an interaction,  Bundle of Fireworks and  Squid Polyp will activate, allowing for use in scenarios where you otherwise couldn't use them.
Despite  Faulty Conductor being a movement speed item, it is not inherited, although it will become stronger while effected by the buff from the item.
Movement speed reducing items such as  Stone Flux Pauldron,  Tonic Affliction,  Neutronium Weight are not inherited.
 Gorag's Opus &  Faulty Conductor can even further increase his speed.
Similarly to   Charged Gauntlet,   Thunder Gauntlet, and   Transport Mode, the Solus unit does more damage the faster it moves.
Since the Solus unit inherits the user's movement speed items, it's advisable to get more movement speed items in order to increase its damage output.
